channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- UEFI BIOS https stack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- UEFI BIOS https stack

item.title: CVE-2021-21571|2024-08-03T18:16:23.284Z -- dell -- uefi%20bios%20https%20stack
item.description: Dell UEFI BIOS https stack leveraged by the Dell BIOSConnect feature and Dell HTTPS Boot feature contains an improper certificate validation vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability using a person-in-the-middle attack which may lead to a denial of service and payload tampering.
